بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
أقر أبيمه بن بجوش المزارع ببلجسوق أقر إقرار له ø
طوع راغب وطالب وأشهد على نفسه في صحّته وجواز
أمر طائعا غير مكره ولا مجبر ولا مضطهد ولا جاهلا
بما أقر به فيه أن عليه وعنده وقبله وفي ذمّته وخالص
ماله دينا ثابتا وحقّا لازما له لزمه من ø الإقرار به لزمزوم
بن نصر نضر من القمح الطّيّب الصّل النّصيل السّالم من العلث
أربعة أرادب وأن يقوم بذلك في صفر صيفة سنة ستّة وعشرين
بغير مدافعة ولا ممانعة ولا احتجاج بحجّة دون الخروج
من المبلغ المذكور على تمامه وكماله وبــذلك أقر وأشهد على
نفسه في العشر الثّاني من محرّم سنة سبع وعشرين وخمسمائة
شهدت عليه بذلك وكتب
إسمعيل بن زيد بن أحمد بن عبد اللّه

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ʾaqarra ʾabīmahu bnu biǧūša ăl muzāriʿu bi bulǧusūqa ʾaqarra ʾiqrār la ø hu ø
ṭawʿ rāġib wa ṭālib wa ʾašhada ʿalà nafsi hi fī ṣiḥḥaẗi hi wa ǧawāzi
ʾamr:in ṭāʾiʿ:an ġayra mukrah:in wa lā muǧbar:in wa lā muḍṭahad:in wa lā ǧāhil:an
bi mā ʾaqarra bi hi fī hi ʾanna ʿalay hi wa ʿinda hu wa qibala hu wa fī ḏimmaẗi hi wa ḫāliṣi
māli hi dayn:an ṯābit:an wa ḥaqq:an lāzim:an la lazima hu mina ø ăl ʾiqrāru ʾiqrāri bi hi li zamzūma
bni naṣar:in naḍr:in naṣr:in mina ăl qamḥi ăṭ ṭayyibi ăṣ ăn ṣalli naṣīli ăs sālimi min ăl ʿalaṯi
ʾarbaʿaẗa ʾarādiba wa ʾan yaqūma bi ḏālika fī ṣafar:in ṣayfaẗi sanaẗa sanaẗi sittaẗ:in wa ʿišrīna
bi ġayri mudāfaʿaẗ:in wa lā mumānaʿaẗ:in wa lā ĭḥtiǧāǧ:in bi ḥuǧǧaẗ:in dūna ăl ḫurūǧi
mina ăl mablaġi ăl maḏkūri ʿalà tamāmi hi wa kamāli hi wa bi ḏālika ʾaqarra wa ʾašhada ʿalà
nafsi hi fī ăl ʿašri ăṯ ṯānī min muḥarram:in sanaẗa sabʿ:in wa ʿišrīna wa ḫamsi miʾaẗ:in
šahidtu ʿalay hi bi ḏālika wa kataba
ʾismāʿīlu bnu zaydi bni ʾaḥmada bni ʿabdi ăl lāhi

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Abîme b. Beǧôš, the farmer in Bulǧusûq, has acknowledged, (viz.) he has acknowledged for himself
voluntarily, desiring and demanding it and has called witnesses to testify to his obligation, he being sound and capable of transacting
business, voluntarily, wihtout compulsion and not against his will and not under constraint, and not ignorant
of what he has acknowledged herein, viz. that he owes, has in his possession, is in debt and under obligation for, with his undiminished
property, as an obligatory debt and an obligation incumbent upon him on the basis of the acknowledgment thereto, to Zamzûm
b. Naṣr of good, cleansed wheat, free from any admixture
eight artabas, and that he will present himself with it in Ṣafar of the year (five hundred and) twenty six four artabas, and that he will present himself with it in Ṣafar of the year (five hundred and) twenty six
without any delay, or pretext for refusal, or by bringing forward any argument beyond the paying
of the afore-mentioned amount completely and fully. And thereto he has acknowledged and has called witnesses to testify to his obligation
in the second decade of Muḥarram of the year five hundred and twenty seven.
I have testified thereto for him and
Ismaʿîl b. Zaid b. Aḥmad b. ʿAbdallâh has written (it).
